text:
Square (https://squareup.com/) | (SF, NY, ATL, WAT) | Onsite | Full-time / Interns

Currently on the lookout for generalist engineers for 2016 internships and new grad related roles. Bonus points if you're interested in mobile development, we will be offering internal training.

Apply on our site (https://squareup.com/careers) , then email me.

email: bridgpal@squareup.com, mention HN in the subject.
